subjectline.content: [FirstName], time is running out to pick a new tariff

html.content:
Having trouble seeing this email? Click here to view in your browser.
Account Number: [ExternalAccountID]
Hello [FirstName],
Your current 100% renewable electricity tariff will end on 31 May. It might be time to start thinking about your next one.
To make things worth your while, we’ve handpicked a tariff that includes a Ring Video Doorbell (2nd Generation) and Chime at no extra cost.
Plus it’s a Go Further tariff, which means your home energy will be carbon neutral.
That’s a lot to take in, so let us break it down for you.
[SpecialTariff]
£[PersonalProjectionMonthly] per month*
£[PersonalProjectionAnnual] Estimated per year*
100% renewable electricity
Carbon credits for electricity and gas
Includes Ring Video Doorbell (2nd Generation) and Chime
Exclusive rewards with Shell Go+
Switch now
Alternatively you can choose our ~specialtariff~ tariff, where your energy rates will be protected for 36 months.
[SpecialTariff]
£[PersonalProjectionMonthly] per month*
£[PersonalProjectionAnnual] Estimated per year*
100% renewable electricity
Price rise protection until April 2023
Broadband discount available
Exclusive rewards with Shell Go+
Switch now
[SpecialTariff]
£[PersonalProjectionMonthly] per month*
£[PersonalProjectionAnnual] Estimated per year*
  100% renewable electricity
  Carbon neutral home energy
  Broadband discount available
  Exclusive rewards with Shell Go+
Switch now
 
Ring Video Doorbell
(2nd Generation) and Chime
See, hear and speak to visitors from anywhere with the new and improved Ring Video Doorbell (2nd Generation) and Chime. Get instant notifications on your phone and tablet, customise your motion settings and stay connected to your home, no matter where you are.
Learn more
 
For more information on all our tariffs, products and services, visit My Account.
Thanks,
The Shell Energy Team
My Account
Help
Contact Us
 
Account Number: CUSTOMERID

The Registered Office of Shell Energy Retail Limited is Shell Energy House, Westwood Business Park, Westwood Way, Coventry CV4 8HS. Registered in England and Wales. Company number 05070887.
Terms and conditions:

† ??????

??????

Get help with an energy problem

Contact Citizens Advice if you need help with an energy problem - for example with your bills or meters, or if you’re struggling to pay for the energy you use. They’re the official source of free and independent energy advice and support. Go to: citizensadvice.org.uk/energy or call their consumer service on 0808 223 1133. Calls are free.

If you need to make a complaint please contact us directly through our enquiry form at shellenergy.co.uk/contact-us or customer services team on 0330 094 5800. If you remain unhappy with our resolution of your complaint, or if your complaint has not been resolved within 8 weeks of the date you told us about it, you may refer the matter to the Ombudsman Services: Energy on 0330 440 1624 or at ombudsman-services.org/sectors/energy. They are free and independent, and we are bound by their decision.

Our fuel mix - To see how we generate your electricity supply please visit our website.

For an up to date view of our full tariff range please visit our website.

For more information on the environmental impact of your electricity supply write to us at Shell Energy House, Westwood Business Park, Westwood Way, Coventry CV4 8HS.

If you no longer want to receive marketing emails you can unsubscribe here.

PS. You can’t reply to this message so please visit our help and advice pages if you want to learn more. Please access shellenergy.co.uk/email_disclaimer for an important electronic communications disclaimer.

If you have changed tariff in the last 48 hours please disregard this email.

BMC-JIRANUMBER
